pr_title: Speed up CI "Initial JDK 11 Build" & fix some dependency gaps

timeline.bodyText: Ah nice, I wanted to experiment with that.
timeline.author: gsmet
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -83,7 +83,7 @@ jobs:
           key: q2maven-${{ steps.get-date.outputs.date }}
       - name: Build
         run: |
-          mvn -e -B -DskipTests -DskipITs -Dno-format clean install
+          mvn -T1C -e -B -DskipTests -DskipITs -Dinvoker.skip -Dno-format clean install

WIP: update-extension-dependencies.sh

timeline.bodyText:
This and the previous commands would make sure that everything relevant that goes into the descriptor is up to date.
On the other hand we could instead just expect everything to be up to date and remove those commands.
PS: Building everything except integration-tests is not that easy, that's why multiple commands...
timeline.author: famod
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,45 @@
+#!/bin/bash
+
+# Purpose: Updates pom.xml files with symbolic dependencies to extensions to enforce a consistent build order.
+
+set -e -u -o pipefail
+shopt -s failglob
+
+echo ''
+echo 'Building bom-descriptor-json...'
+echo ''
+#mvn -D quickly -T0.8C -f independent-projects/arc
+#mvn -D quickly -T0.8C -f bom/application
+#mvn -D quickly -T0.8C -f core
+#mvn -D quickly -T0.8C -f extensions

timeline.bodyText: Placement of the script in root ok? Or somewhere else?
timeline.author: famod

timeline.bodyText: General idea is to avoid additional (temporary) files, so everything is stored in variables.
timeline.author: famod
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,45 @@

timeline.bodyText: I think it is a good idea to have in the pom.xml a reference to the script.
timeline.author: famod
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,45 @@
+#!/bin/bash
+
+# Purpose: Updates pom.xml files with symbolic dependencies to extensions to enforce a consistent build order.
+
+set -e -u -o pipefail
+shopt -s failglob
+
+echo ''
+echo 'Building bom-descriptor-json...'
+echo ''
+#mvn -D quickly -T0.8C -f independent-projects/arc
+#mvn -D quickly -T0.8C -f bom/application
+#mvn -D quickly -T0.8C -f core
+#mvn -D quickly -T0.8C -f extensions
+mvn clean package -f devtools/bom-descriptor-json
+
+DEP_TEMPLATE='        <dependency>
+            <groupId>io.quarkus</groupId>
+            <artifactId>XXX</artifactId>
+            <version>\${project.version}</version>
+            <type>pom</type>
+            <scope>test</scope>
+            <exclusions>
+                <exclusion>
+                    <groupId>*</groupId>
+                    <artifactId>*</artifactId>
+                </exclusion>
+            </exclusions>
+        </dependency>'
+
+echo ''
+echo 'Building dependencies list from bom-descriptor-json...'
+echo ''
+DEPS=`grep -Po '(?<="artifact-id": ")[^"]+' devtools/bom-descriptor-json/target/*.json \
+  | sort \
+  | xargs -i sh -c "echo \"${DEP_TEMPLATE}\" | sed 's/XXX/{}/'" \
+  | sed ':a;N;$!ba;s/\n/\\\n/g'`    # replace newlines with \n so that sed accepts ${DEPS} as input
+
+MARK_START='<!-- START update-extension-dependencies.sh -->'

timeline.bodyText: More pom.xml could be added here although I'm asking myself is whether docs should really receive the very same deps as bom-descriptor-json?
timeline.author: famod
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,45 @@
+#!/bin/bash
+
+# Purpose: Updates pom.xml files with symbolic dependencies to extensions to enforce a consistent build order.
+
+set -e -u -o pipefail
+shopt -s failglob
+
+echo ''
+echo 'Building bom-descriptor-json...'
+echo ''
+#mvn -D quickly -T0.8C -f independent-projects/arc
+#mvn -D quickly -T0.8C -f bom/application
+#mvn -D quickly -T0.8C -f core
+#mvn -D quickly -T0.8C -f extensions
+mvn clean package -f devtools/bom-descriptor-json
+
+DEP_TEMPLATE='        <dependency>
+            <groupId>io.quarkus</groupId>
+            <artifactId>XXX</artifactId>
+            <version>\${project.version}</version>
+            <type>pom</type>
+            <scope>test</scope>
+            <exclusions>
+                <exclusion>
+                    <groupId>*</groupId>
+                    <artifactId>*</artifactId>
+                </exclusion>
+            </exclusions>
+        </dependency>'
+
+echo ''
+echo 'Building dependencies list from bom-descriptor-json...'
+echo ''
+DEPS=`grep -Po '(?<="artifact-id": ")[^"]+' devtools/bom-descriptor-json/target/*.json \
+  | sort \
+  | xargs -i sh -c "echo \"${DEP_TEMPLATE}\" | sed 's/XXX/{}/'" \
+  | sed ':a;N;$!ba;s/\n/\\\n/g'`    # replace newlines with \n so that sed accepts ${DEPS} as input
+
+MARK_START='<!-- START update-extension-dependencies.sh -->'
+MARK_END='<!-- END update-extension-dependencies.sh -->'
+
+echo ''
+echo 'Updating bom-descriptor-json/pom.xml...'
+echo ''
+sed -i "/${MARK_START}/,/${MARK_END}/c\        ${MARK_START}\n${DEPS}\n        ${MARK_END}" devtools/bom-descriptor-json/pom.xml

Speed up CI "Initial JDK 11 Build" & fix some dependency gaps

- build in parallel
- fix "dependency gaps" via new update-extension-dependencies.sh support script
- don't execute any maven invoker tests
